mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item AS i INNER JOIN user AS u ON i.user_idx = u.user_idx ORDER BY i.item_idx DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{count}
mapper.insert: insert into `item` ( item_code, user_idx, name, content, item_img_url, price, discount_rate, m_rate, created_date ) values ( #{item_code}, #{user_idx}, #{name}, #{content}, #{item_img_url}, #{price}, #{discount_rate}, #{m_rate}, sysdate() )
